detectors.description:
Claimable.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a8b758bbc4a5791c5647ca80351e008f1e3bca1_ItemToken.sol#126-128) should emit an event for: 
	- pendingOwner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a8b758bbc4a5791c5647ca80351e008f1e3bca1_ItemToken.sol#127)

Claimable.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a8b758bbc4a5791c5647ca80351e008f1e3bca1_ItemToken.sol#126) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pendingOwner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a8b758bbc4a5791c5647ca80351e008f1e3bca1_ItemToken.sol#127)

AccessByGame.onlyAccessByGame() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a8b758bbc4a5791c5647ca80351e008f1e3bca1_ItemToken.sol#143-146) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(! paused && (msg.sender == owner || contractAccess[msg.sender] == true)) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a8b758bbc4a5791c5647ca80351e008f1e3bca1_ItemToken.sol#144)
